title: The Death of Stephen Hawking - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/15/18
itunes:title: The Death of Stephen Hawking - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/15/18
description:
George Noory and theoretical physicist Dr. Leonard Mlodinow discuss the passing of famed physicist Stephen Hawking, and his working relationship and friendship with the scientist that helped form mankind's understanding of the universe.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
